sentences.en: Furniture can also be custom-made to suit your own requirements.
sentences.cn: 你也可以按照自己的要求定制家具。

sentences.en: He awoke early, as was his custom.
sentences.cn: 他很早醒来，这是他的习惯。

sentences.en: In China the custom prevails in eating dumplings on New Year's Eve.
sentences.cn: 在中国,除夕晚上吃饺子的风俗很盛行.

sentences.en: It took ages to clear customs (= be allowed through customs ) but then we were out of the airport quite quickly.
sentences.cn: 过海关花了很长时间，不过出机场倒是很快。

sentences.en: She was stopped at customs and questioned.
sentences.cn: 她在海关被叫住接受问话。

sentences.en: Such a custom has come down to the present moment.
sentences.cn: 这种风俗一直流传到现在。

sentences.en: That custom has fallen off.
sentences.cn: 那个风俗已经废弃了。

sentences.en: The custom has gone out of use.
sentences.cn: 那种风俗已被废弃.

sentences.en: The custom is of Scottish derivation.
sentences.cn: 这风俗起源于苏格兰.

sentences.en: The custom lingers on.
sentences.cn: 此种风俗历久犹存.

sentences.en: The custom of lighting the Olympic flame goes back centuries.
sentences.cn: 点燃奥运圣火的风俗可追溯到几个世纪前。

sentences.en: The custom of worshipping ancestors is prevalent among these people.
sentences.cn: 崇拜祖先的风俗在这些人中是普遍的.

sentences.en: The custom traces to the time of the Warring States.
sentences.cn: 这个风俗可上溯到战国时代.

sentences.en: The custom will never receive the sanction of tradition.
sentences.cn: 那种风俗绝不会作为传统的东西而被提倡.

sentences.en: The guide offers information on local customs.
sentences.cn: 导游手册介绍了当地的风俗习惯。

sentences.en: The machine was custom-built by Steve Roberts.
sentences.cn: 这台机器是请史蒂夫·罗伯茨定做的。

sentences.en: They kept to the custom to hold their wedding.
sentences.cn: 他们按当地风俗举行婚礼.

sentences.en: This custom has been passed down since the 18 th century.
sentences.cn: 这个风俗从18世纪就沿袭下来.

sentences.en: This custom has fallen into abeyance now.
sentences.cn: 这个风俗现在已经不时兴了.

sentences.en: This old custom has fallen off here.
sentences.cn: 这一旧风俗在此地已经废弃了.

sentences.en: When they conquered Britain, the Romans brought this custom with them.
sentences.cn: 古罗马人征服英国的时候也带来了这个风俗。

sentences.en: You have the right to withhold your custom if you so wish.
sentences.cn: 如果你这么不想来，你可以不再光顾。

sentences.en: You won’t be able to take that through customs.
sentences.cn: 你带着那东西过不了海关的。

words.tran_cn: 自定义；客制化；自定义级别
定制；按特别订货生产（customize的过去式和过去分词）
依照顾客具体要求而制造（等于customize）
定做，按客户具体要求制造

phrases.tran_cn: 清关；外贸通关；进出口报关
定做的，非现成的；定制品
客户服务；海关服务；自定义服务

trans.tran_en: custom products or services are specially designed and made for a particular person
something that is done by people in a particular society because it is traditional
something that is done by people in a particular society because it is traditional
